Title: DNN Rad Tag Cloud
Description: A module that uses Telerik's Tag Cloud control to display tags applied in a DotNetNuke install.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A module that uses Telerik's Tag Cloud control to display tags applied in a DotNetNuke install.

This module allows complete control over the look and feel of your tag cloud. It requires DotNetNuke 5.6 or greater and a site that utilizes core tagging (managed under Admin -> Taxonomy and requires skin object/third party module usage).

You can view a live demo of the module here: http://www.chrispaterra.com/Modules/TagCloud.aspx
